name: Solar Rally
description:
Solar Rally is a fun, fast paced game created for the Leap Motion hardware as apart of IndieCade and Leap Motions 3DJam.

Use your hands to cast shadows over the leading cars to stop them from colliding with one another. If clouds get in the way, just wave them away!
The more cars you get to the exit the higher your score!

Solar Rally will be available to iOS soon featuring Achievements and social integrations!

Update v0.5.1

  • Multiple Bug fixes (including major bug which froze game often)
  • HUD shows score
  • Main Menu shows local high score

Update v0.5.2

  • Updated visuals

Update v1.0.0

  • Full features.
